record.dc:title: 17BT2, 15BT2, Butler County, Kentucky. Annis Mound. Feature 11, Burned basin section.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Late Prehistoric Mississippian Sites in Kentucky
record.wpa:narrative: Feature 11, an irregular bank of burned clay, perhaps part of a fire basin; probably partly destroyed by the growth of a gum tree over it. It lies within an accumulation of wall lines and post-molds which have been recorded as Feature 10. Feature 10, however, is probably part of Feature 9. View from northwest. See also photo 16.
